mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "dkContract.id", contract.name AS "dkContract.name", a.descript AS "descript", a.submit_date AS "submitDate", a.pic AS "pic", a.percent AS "percent", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN dk_contract contract ON contract.id = a.contract_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_contract_schedule( id, contract_id, descript, submit_date, pic, percent, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contractId}, #{descript}, #{submitDate}, #{pic}, #{percent}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dk_contract_schedule SET contract_id = #{contractId}, descript = #{descript}, submit_date = #{submitDate}, pic = #{pic}, percent = #{percent}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
